text: Bhandu Bhabhili Bhaliminyanga Shabhibhu Bhai, a Yeshu gubhatandwibhe bheleketa nabhonji kwa ndango. â€œBhandu bhamo bhashinkulima nngunda gwa mishabhibhu. Gubhashenjele ubhigo, gubhaolile liimbo lya minyila shabhibhu, nishenga na nnala. Gubhaapelenje ngunda gula bhaalimanga, nkupinga bhalipilanje, gubhapite mmwanja.
